name: Cryonica
description:
CRYONICA

Cryonica is a medieval themed platformer-puzzle game. You take control of an Cryonium Engineer who must make their way through the underbelly of the city known as Cryonica!

Cryonica is my first solo project in Unreal Engine. After spending a few months becoming more familiar with the engine I began working on Cryonica as a way to showcase what I had learned.

The Objective

To make your way through the levels and basements of Cryonica and find a way out. 

The Gameplay

The gameplay is meant to be simple but involving. No gotcha's or tricks, so long as you're paying attention. You'll need to platform around and retrieve Cryonium Crystals to power the elevators that lead to the next level. Getting the right Crystals and flipping the right switches is the name of the game.
